articles.description: Follow match build-up, live text updates and radio commentary from the Premier League with coverage starting with the lunchtime kick-off as Southampton take on Manchester United.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Southampton v Manchester United & seven other games - live text & radio commentary

articles.description: Callum Hudson-Odoi and unbeaten Nottingham Forest stun Liverpool at Anfield to end Arne Slot’s perfect start as Reds boss.
articles.title: Forest stun Liverpool with Hudson-Odoi's winner

articles.description: Get latest scores and follow live text updates on day two of the Solheim Cup at Robert Trent Jones Golf Club in Gainesville, Virginia.
articles.title: Solheim Cup 2024 LIVE: Scores, leaderboard and updates from foursomes on day two as the United States host Europe in Virginia

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Manchester City vs Brentford in the Premier League
articles.title: Manchester City vs Brentford: Premier League - BBC Sport

articles.description: The United States held of a spirited European charge in Saturday's opening session of the Solheim Cup to maintain their four-point lead.
articles.title: Solheim Cup 2024: US repel Europe fightback to maintain four-point lead

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC radio commentary from 18:15 as Somerset face Gloucestershire face in the T20 Blast final at Edgbaston.
articles.title: T20 Blast final LIVE: Somerset v Gloucestershire score, commentary & updates

articles.description: An inexperienced England side, featuring four debutants, take a 1-0 lead in the T20 series against Ireland with a 67-run win.
articles.title: Ireland vs England: Tourists cruise to victory in opening T20 in Dublin

articles.description: Rory McIlroy's dream of lifting the Irish Open trophy in his home county remains alive as he takes a one-shot cushion heading into the final day at Royal County Down.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: World number takes one-shot lead into Irish Open final round

articles.description: Ferrari’s Charles Leclerc takes pole position at the Azerbaijan Grand Prix for the fourth year in a row as title rivals Max Verstappen and Lando Norris start sixth and 17th.
articles.title: Lando Norris 17th as Charles Leclerc takes Azerbaijan GP pole

articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag says Marcus Rashford has received "too much negativity" recently after the striker scored his first goal of the season in the win at Southampton.
articles.title: Southampton 0-3 Man Utd: Marcus Rashford backed to carry on scoring by boss Erik ten Hag
